attributes.additional_details: in light of the recent bail out of the banks with tax payers money i as a british citizen and taxpayer petition the government to sure up and sell rbs and other publicily owned financial institutions and use the money to add solar panels and a wind turbine to every home in britain therfore saving us all money that we can pump into the economy or keep in the bank (shuring them up) and also saving the envroment! be brave for our pockets our economy and most importantly our children! the economic boost to all other sectors would more than offset the loss of the greedy energy firms and cut our reliance on unstable countries it makes a lot of sense!
